fields.title: Emergency shelter assistance
fields.description: Refers to assistance in reconstruction or construction of shelter

fields.title: Cash or voucher for shelter
fields.description: To include host, rental and cash for work for shelter and settlements

fields.title: Collective shelter support
fields.description: Support provided to, and management of collective or reception centers, and also activities facilitating hosting at families

fields.title: Multi-purpose cash (unconditional)
fields.description: Organise CVA distributions for basic needs in a timely, secured and accountable way

fields.title: Education support for children, adolescents, and young adults
fields.description: Awareness sessions and trainings for educacional purposes. Support in homework, language and literacy etc.

fields.title: Education supplies, kits, or equipment distribution for children, adolescents and young adults
fields.description: Children kits, equipment for schools

fields.title: Education spaces constructed or rehabilitation
fields.description: Refers to Rehabilitation of Educational Facilities

fields.title: Food distribution (in-kind)
fields.description: Physical food distributions only. Note that cash or vouchers that are intended to cover food needs would either be reported as multi-purpose cash; or as conditional cash or voucher for food security

fields.title: Cash or voucher for food security and livelihoods
fields.description: Conditional CVA: for food security, or livelihoods protection / recovery / strengthening etc. For agricultural livelihoods, income generation, small business etc

fields.title: In-kind support for food security & livelihoods
fields.description: Inputs, materials, or tools distribution (in-kind). For agricultural livelihoods, income generation, small business etc

fields.title: Essential services, information, or training for food security & livelihoods
fields.description: For agricultural production, income generation / small business, employment. Includes services, referrals & training related to employability & labour markets

fields.title: First aid
fields.description: Refers to number of volunteers/staff that have completed FA training and/or people who have received first aid treatment

fields.title: First aid training
fields.description: Refers to first aid training course run

fields.title: Primary healthcare, mobile or stationary clinics
fields.description: Refers to any static or mobile set up that provides a PHC activity

fields.title: Search and rescue
fields.description: Activities to  co-ordinate initial medical assistance or medical evacuation, through the use of public and private resources

fields.title: Health promotion, disease prevention
fields.description: Refers to activities that come under the definition of health promotion/behaviour change that reduces the risk of disease or injury - can inlcude immunisation related activities, health education and training to volunteers which can mobilise them to implement health promotion related activities

fields.title: Hygiene promotion
fields.description: Activities meant to secure feedback on WASH facilities, encourage people to use them or other activities meant to improve hygiene behaviour

fields.title: Hygiene supply distribution
fields.description: Hygiene items such as soap, toothbrush, menstrual hygiene etc

fields.title: Water source improvements
fields.description: Activities to increase water reliability, quanitiry or quantity or those that reduce distance to water supplies

fields.title: Water treatment facilities contruction/rehabilitation
fields.description: Permanent infrastructure or emergency units

fields.title: Water treatment supply distribution
fields.description: Tablets and filtration devices and activities to ensure their use

fields.title: Water distribution
fields.description: Delivery of water by pipeline or trucking

fields.title: Handwashing facilities construction/rehabilitation
fields.description: Permanent or temporary facilities, including hand sanitizer or water and soap

fields.title: Toilet facilities construction/rehabilitation
fields.description: Simple pit latrines, communal or family toilets

fields.title: Restoring family links
fields.description: Hotlines, materials and staff/volunteer support to restore links with families

fields.title: Child-friendly spaces
fields.description: Set up CFS, procure materials for activities with Children,CP activities, trainings and IEC awareness materials

fields.title: Specialised programme preventing or responding to violence
fields.description: E.g. SGBV programming & dignity kit ditribution

fields.title: Referrals to case management/follow-up services
fields.description: Mapping of services, provide trainings on safe referrals. Identify and evaluate needs for referralsTo include health,social services, protection but not legal migration referrals

fields.title: Prevention of Sexual Exploitation & Abuse & Child safeguarding SOPs, policies & training
fields.description: IEC awareness materials, SOPs, provide survivor centered approach, mapping of services

fields.title: Establishing humanitarian service points / safe service provision/distribution points
Support / accompaniment in official procedures
fields.description: Migration, temporary protection, asylum, healthcare

fields.title: CEA training for staff & volunteers
fields.description: Standalone CEA trainings, or sectoral trainings including CEA sessions

fields.title: Information sharing/awareness raising
fields.description: materials and/or activities

fields.title: Community complaints and feedback mechanisms
fields.description: Systems in place to receive feedback and complaints, respond appropriately, and use feedback to inform planning and adaptation

fields.title: Perception or satisfaction survey
fields.description: Surveys gauge people's understanding of the crisis and/or satisfaction with Movement services - satisfaction can be incorporated in Post Distribution Monitoring

fields.title: Rumour tracking
fields.description: Systems in place to understand rumours circulating in communities - in person or online
